theme: 🎬 Sax & Screen - Wear something that shows your favorite film or musical.

items.text: Registration and Check-in - Hatter Hall Dormitory
Young Artist Auditions Final Round - Hatter Hall, Floor 2 Lounge
subpoints: Young Artist finalists will be notified via email with their audition time.
Dr. Rosenberg will adjudicate the final round auditions.
Winners will be announced at the meeting later in the day.
Students meet in lobby of Hatter Hall.
Students will be escorted to CUB by workshop staff.
Students must have their workshop name badge to enter.
Feasel Hall is inside McMahan Hall.
Bring large ensemble and chamber ensemble instruments.
Symphonic Saxophones (10th-12+ grade): Large Ensemble - Feasel Hall
Concert Saxophones (7th-9th grade): Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Symphonic Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Concert Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Lee Chapel (inside Elizabeth Hall (map))

items.text: Faculty Recital: Saxophone Workshop Staff - Lee Chapel
subpoints: Lee Chapel is inside Elizabeth Hall

items.text: Practice Time or Relax in Dorm - Presser or Hatter Hall
subpoints: Students may stay in Presser to practice or go to Hatter Hall to relax.
Students will be escorted to Hatter Hall in a group.

items.text: All Students in Dorm - Hatter Hall
Hall Meeting with Counselors - Lounge of your floor in Hatter Hall
subpoints: Students will meet with the counselor staff to discuss the rules and procedures for the rest of the week.
After the meeting students will relax in the dorm.

theme: Sharks & Jets - Wear something with a 🦈 shark or a ✈️ jet on it. 🫰… 🫰… 🫰…

items.text: ⏰ Wake up; prepare for the day.
Students meet staff members in designated locations - Hatter Hall

subpoints: Class is determined by instrument played in large ensemble.
Symphonic Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Feasel Hall
Concert Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Young Artist winners will be coached by Mr. Devlin on their pieces for the concert.
Symphonic Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Concert Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Lee Chapel

items.text: Faculty Recital: Dr. Rosenberg and Ms. Charlton - Lee Chapel
📽️ Movie Night - Lynn Business Center (LBC) Auditorium
subpoints: Students will meet staff members in designated locations and will travel to LBC together.
Snacks and drinks will be provided. No delivery food allowed.
After the movie, students will meet up with staff members to walk to Hatter Hall.

theme: ⚡ Greased Lightning - Wear something retro! Bandanas, rolled sleeves, bowling shirts, sunglasses. Inspired by 🕶️ Grease, 💃 West Side Story, 🎭 Fame, 👣 Footloose).

items.text: ⏰ Wake up; prepare for the day.
Students meet staff members in designated locations - Hatter Hall

subpoints: Symphonic Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Feasel Hall
Concert Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Symphonic Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Concert Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Lee Chapel
Students learn the rules and objectives in Feasel
All students return to Feasel by 5:45 PM
Winners announced at 6:00 PM in Feasel

items.text: Guest Artist Recital: Greg Osby - Tinsley Hall
Jam Session with Greg Osby & Band - Tinsley Hall
⏰ Wake up; prepare for the day.
Students meet staff members in designated locations - Hatter Hall

subpoints: Class is determined by instrument played in large ensemble.
Symphonic Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Feasel Hall
Concert Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms

items.text: Masterclass: Preparing for All-State Auditions - Feasel Hall
subpoints: 7-8 grade: Presser 112
9-10 grade: Presser 352
11-12 grade: Feasel
Symphonic Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Concert Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Lee Chapel
Change into workshop t-shirt after class
Young Artist winners will meet staff member at 6:45 PM to go to Lee Chapel for warm-up.

items.text: Young Artist Honors Recital - Lee Chapel
Practice Time or Relax in Dorm - Presser or Hatter Hall
subpoints: Students may stay in Presser to practice or go to Hatter Hall to relax.
Students will be escorted to Hatter Hall in a group.
After the movie, students will meet up with staff members to walk to Hatter Hall.

theme: 🧚‍♀️ Team Pink or 🧙‍♀️ Team Green - Wear something pink or something green to show your support for Glinda (pink) or Elphaba (green)… or maybe some of both!

items.text: ⏰ Wake up; prepare for the day.
Students meet staff members in designated locations - Hatter Hall

subpoints: Symphonic Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Feasel Hall
Concert Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Symphonic Saxophones: Chamber Ensembles - Various Rooms
Concert Saxophones: Large Ensemble - Lee Chapel

items.text: Chamber Music Dress Rehearsal - Lee Chapel
subpoints: Students will sit in assigned areas before and after performance.
Chamber groups will run-through their piece(s).
Students have the option to leave the CUB for Hatter Hall at 6:45 to prepare for the concert.
Students will be escorted to Hatter Hall by staff member(s).

items.text: Change Clothes for Concert - Hatter Hall
subpoints: Remaining group of students will move from CUB to Hatter Hall with staff members.

items.text: Walk to Lee Chapel - Hatter Hall → Lee Chapel
subpoints: All students will meet staff members at their AM locations to walk to Lee Chapel.
Students sit in assigned areas as rehearsed.
Student begin packing for move out.

theme: 🎓 School Spirit Day - Show off your school pride with your favorite school-themed attire!

items.text: ⏰ Early wake up; students complete packing for move out. - Hatter Hall
subpoints: Students do not need to wear concert clothes yet.

items.text: Students meet staff members in designated locations - Hatter Hall

subpoints: Symphonic Saxophones: Feasel
Concert Saxophones: Lee Chapel
Combined Ensemble: Lee Chapel

items.text: Dress for concert & check out - Hatter Hall
subpoints: All students will go to Hatter Hall to check out
Parents pick up student's belongings from Hatter Hall.

Students need to:
  • ✅ wear concert clothes
  • ✅ bring saxophone(s) & equipment for concert (reeds, mpc. neckstrap, etc.)
    • ⚠️ other personal saxophones should be packed
    • ⚠️ borrowed saxophones & equipment will be returned after concert
  • ✅ bring music folder for concert

items.text: Students meet staff members in designated locations - Hatter Hall
subpoints: Parents will go to Lee Chapel separately

items.text: Call time for students - Lee Chapel
subpoints: Students sit in assigned areas.

items.text: Return borrowed music, saxophones, equipment - Tinsley Hall
